group_1.textCenter: "Cooking Class — Open for Students"@So this is the place holding the class...
That's the most famous restaurant in@Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: I went with a bunch of girls before.@It was so good I started sobbing...

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, Hazuki, Ayame... What do you@think?
I couldn't even improve after following@this book so closely...
Do you really think I might improve@by going to a cooking class?

group_1.textRight: Whoooa! I don't think I've ever seen@you so down, Konoha...

group_1.textLeft: Huh?[chara:302601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:302601:cheek_0][chara:302601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302601:lipSynch_1] Of course... Even I get anxious@sometimes.
But even after working and studying so @hard...
[chara:302601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I thought maybe at least people might@be able to eat it without fainting...

group_1.textRight: But you'll have someone at Walnut's@teaching you! They're amazing!
This is like, a once in a blue moon@kinda chance, you know?
You can watch how the teacher does it in@person and follow along as they teach.
And if you mess up, there'll be a pro there@to help you fix it!
If you really, truly wanna give this @your all...
You should try everything you can! Don't@you think?
(And if it's a cooking class, we won't@be the taste testers!)

group_1.textLeft: You're right... I do want to learn how@to cook. Whatever it takes.
No matter what steps I must take...@No matter how long I must toil...
I will become better at cooking!@I must!
Of course, our finances are a factor...
But more than that, this is a promise@I made to you, after all.

group_1.textRight: R-right… Wait, did you promise that?
Uh, it's a good idea, anyway! The cookin'@class, I mean.
(Plus, it won't be me who has to taste it.)

group_1.textLeft: I'll go to this cooking class!

group_1.textCenter: The ABCs of Cooking? Uh… No comment…
